name: Chromasynth (Demo) (Real)
description:
The demo for the visual novel Chromasynth, taking place in a world where everyone is color-coded and some even have special powers! 

Play as Oojin Kim, a competitor in the most popular reality show in the country. Travel from city to city, form alliances with other competitors, and survive the trials set up by the 16 Trial Captains. And unlike a real TV show, you'll get to choose how to play - whether your goal is to win the million, ask out a special someone, or eliminate with no mercy.
